text: was a village located in Hiroo District, Tokachi Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of 2004, the village had an estimated population of 1,802 and a density of 13.10 persons per km². The total area was 137.54 km². On February 6, 2006, Chūrui was merged into the expanded town of Makubetsu (in Nakagawa (Tokachi) District). ==External links== * Makubetsu official website Category:Dissolved municipalities of Hokkaido Category:Makubetsu, Hokkaido
title: Chūrui, Hokkaido
